an6.63:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an6.63:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an6.63:2.2: Kama, bhikkhave, veditabba, kamanam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, kamanam vemattata veditabba, kamanam vipako veditabbo, kamanirodho veditabbo, kamanirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:3.1: Vedana, bhikkhave, veditabba, vedananam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, vedananam vemattata veditabba, vedananam vipako veditabbo, vedananirodho veditabbo, vedananirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:4.1: Sanna, bhikkhave, veditabba, sannanam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, sannanam vemattata veditabba, sannanam vipako veditabbo, sannanirodho veditabbo, sannanirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:5.1: Asava, bhikkhave, veditabba, asavanam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, asavanam vemattata veditabba, asavanam vipako veditabbo, asavanirodho veditabbo, asavanirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:6.1: Kammam, bhikkhave, veditabbam, kammanam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, kammanam vemattata veditabba, kammanam vipako veditabbo, kammanirodho veditabbo, kammanirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:7.1: Dukkham, bhikkhave, veditabbam, dukkhassa nidanasambhavo veditabbo, dukkhassa vemattata veditabba, dukkhassa vipako veditabbo, dukkhanirodho veditabbo, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada veditabba.
an6.63:8.1: ‘Kama, bhikkhave, veditabba, kamanam nidanasambhavo veditabbo, kamanam vemattata veditabba, kamanam vipako veditabbo, kamanirodho veditabbo, kamanirodhagamini patipada veditabba’ti, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an6.63:8.4: cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
an6.63:8.8: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
an6.63:8.9: Api ca kho, bhikkhave, nete kama kamaguna namete ariyassa vinaye vuccanti—
an6.63:11.2: Anno, bhikkhave, kamo rupesu, anno kamo saddesu, anno kamo gandhesu, anno kamo rasesu, anno kamo photthabbesu.
an6.63:12.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kamayamano tajjam tajjam attabhavam abhinibbatteti punnabhagiyam va apunnabhagiyam va, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, kamanam vipako.
an6.63:13.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo kamanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:13.4: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
an6.63:14.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam kame pajanati, evam kamanam nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam kamanam vemattatam pajanati, evam kamanam vipakam pajanati, evam kamanirodham pajanati, evam kamanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati kamanirodham.
an6.63:14.2: Kama, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… kamanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:14.3: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:15.1: Vedana, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… vedananirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:15.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an6.63:15.4: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
an6.63:17.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, samisa sukha vedana, atthi niramisa sukha vedana, atthi samisa dukkha vedana, atthi niramisa dukkha vedana, atthi samisa adukkhamasukha vedana, atthi niramisa adukkhamasukha vedana.
an6.63:18.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, vediyamano tajjam tajjam attabhavam abhinibbatteti punnabhagiyam va apunnabhagiyam va,
an6.63:19.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vedananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:20.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam vedanam pajanati, evam vedananam nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam vedananam vemattatam pajanati, evam vedananam vipakam pajanati, evam vedananirodham pajanati, evam vedananirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati. So imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati vedananirodham.
an6.63:20.2: Vedana, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… vedananirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:20.3: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:21.1: Sanna, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… sannanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:21.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an6.63:21.4: rupasanna, saddasanna, gandhasanna, rasasanna, photthabbasanna, dhammasanna.
an6.63:23.2: Anna, bhikkhave, sanna rupesu, anna sanna saddesu, anna sanna gandhesu, anna sanna rasesu, anna sanna photthabbesu, anna sanna dhammesu.
an6.63:24.3: Yatha yatha nam sanjanati tatha tatha voharati, evam sanni ahosinti.
an6.63:25.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo sannanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:26.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam sannam pajanati, evam sannanam nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam sannanam vemattatam pajanati, evam sannanam vipakam pajanati, evam sannanirodham pajanati, evam sannanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati sannanirodham.
an6.63:26.2: Sanna, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… sannanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati.
an6.63:26.3: Iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:27.1: Asava, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… asavanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:27.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
an6.63:29.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, asava nirayagamaniya, atthi asava tiracchanayonigamaniya, atthi asava pettivisayagamaniya, atthi asava manussalokagamaniya, atthi asava devalokagamaniya.
an6.63:30.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, avijjagato tajjam tajjam attabhavam abhinibbatteti punnabhagiyam va apunnabhagiyam va, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asavanam vipako.
an6.63:31.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo asavanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:32.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam asave pajanati, evam asavanam nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam asavanam vemattatam pajanati, evam asavanam vipakam pajanati, evam asavanam nirodham pajanati, evam asavanam nirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati asavanirodham.
an6.63:32.2: Asava, bhikkhave, veditabba …pe… asavanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati.
an6.63:32.3: Iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:33.1: Kammam, bhikkhave, veditabbam …pe… kammanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati, iti kho panetam vuttam.
an6.63:35.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, kammam nirayavedaniyam, atthi kammam tiracchanayonivedaniyam, atthi kammam pettivisayavedaniyam, atthi kammam manussalokavedaniyam, atthi kammam devalokavedaniyam.
an6.63:36.3: dittheva dhamme, upapajje va, apare va pariyaye.
an6.63:37.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo kammanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:38.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam kammam pajanati, evam kammanam nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam kammanam vemattatam pajanati, evam kammanam vipakam pajanati, evam kammanirodham pajanati, evam kammanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati kammanirodham.
an6.63:38.2: Kammam, bhikkhave, veditabbam …pe… kammanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati,
an6.63:38.3: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:39.1: Dukkham, bhikkhave, veditabbam, dukkhassa nidanasambhavo veditabbo, dukkhassa vemattata veditabba, dukkhassa vipako veditabbo, dukkhanirodho veditabbo, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati.
an6.63:39.2: Iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
an6.63:39.3: Jatipi dukkha, jarapi dukkha, byadhipi dukkho, maranampi dukkham, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasapi dukkha, yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham, sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
an6.63:41.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, dukkham adhimattam, atthi parittam, atthi dandhaviragi, atthi khippaviragi.
an6.63:42.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco yena dukkhena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati, yena va pana dukkhena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto bahiddha pariyetthim apajjati:
an6.63:42.3: ‘ko ekapadam dvipadam janati imassa dukkhassa nirodhaya’ti?
an6.63:42.4: Sammohavepakkam vaham, bhikkhave, dukkham vadami pariyetthivepakkam va.
an6.63:43.3: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo dukkhassa nirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
an6.63:44.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam dukkham pajanati, evam dukkhassa nidanasambhavam pajanati, evam dukkhassa vemattatam pajanati, evam dukkhassa vipakam pajanati, evam dukkhanirodham pajanati, evam dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so imam nibbedhikam brahmacariyam pajanati dukkhanirodham.
an6.63:44.2: Dukkham, bhikkhave, veditabbam, dukkhassa nidanasambhavo veditabbo, dukkhassa vemattata veditabba, dukkhassa vipako veditabbo, dukkhanirodho veditabbo, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada veditabbati.
an6.63:44.3: Iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
an6.63:45.1: Ayam kho so, bhikkhave, nibbedhikapariyayo dhammapariyayo”ti.
